descriptionHtml:
This adds CHSBHC BBP support to the Changeable Dress By Nausicaa 
This is a changeable dress. 
You can change a dress by spell.

[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/hta815.jpg[/IMG]

Recommended:
========================
Skyrim 1.9.32+ and SKSE 1.6.13+ is required.
(Option) SKYUI 3.4+ is required.
HDT HighHeels System
CHSBHC body mod and BBP -Breast and Butt Physics 
FNIS Behavior Files and Generator 4.0.2
CBBE-CHSBHC-UNP-ADEC-Human Argonian Khajiit Texture-4096
NoMaaM Breathing Idles BBB 
NoMaaM Walk BBB - inverse orientation

=======Description============================
This is a conversion of Changeable Dress By Nausicaa Armors converted to fit CHSBHC body. The armor can be craftable & smithing at Daedric, DragonScale. 
You can get a spell ([Nausicaa] Change Dress Color) when armor equppied
It dose't supports the weight slider
==============================================
Credits and thanks: 
- Changeable Dress By Nausicaa 
- CHSBHC body mod and BBP by CherryHotaling 

Credits and permissions:
Changeable Dress By Nausicaa
author: golgappa
